resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

 File path: cpp/src/arrow/dataset/projector.cc
 ##########
 @@ -86,32 +113,23 @@ Result<std::shared_ptr<RecordBatch>> RecordBatchProjector::Project(
 
 Status RecordBatchProjector::SetInputSchema(std::shared_ptr<Schema> from,
                                             MemoryPool* pool) {
+  RETURN_NOT_OK(CheckProjectable(*from, *to_));
 
 Review comment:
   If I read this diff correctly, the only place that the R package tests should touch new code (i.e. without calling ReplaceSchema, which has a binding added but no test) is here. Is there something suspicious about CheckProjectable (on 32-bit mingw)?

